bibdata.abstract: Definitions of MAC related functions to enable spectrum resource management are addressed in this amendment to IEEE Std 802.15.4&#x2122;. It specifies the following: - Spectrum resource measurements and network performance metrics, such as packet error ratio, delay, etc. - Information elements and data structures to capture these measurements, - Procedures for collecting and exchanging spectrum resource measurement information with higher layers or otherre devices.
